flag set for variable in execution listeners

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we can clarify a bit what that means.
timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer

timeline.bodyText: I think this should be the wrapper Boolean class to handle cases with null properly? Same for the field declaration in the entity. Or are the database fields in all cases declared to not allow null and have a proper default value (e.g. INITIAL_ smallint check(INITIAL_ in (1,0)); sounds like it)? In that case we must make sure that rolling-update scenarios still work, i.e. a 7.12 engine creates a history detail in the 7.13 schema.
timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer
